page.description: File menu functions also appear on the Standard Toolbar.

case.title: New
case.description: [new]. Opens a new blank document in a new tab.

case.title: Open
case.description: [open]. Displays the Open Page dialog. The display is initially filtered to show only .A5W pages, but you can change the filter to display HTML pages, or all files.

case.title: Close
case.description: [close]. If you have not saved the current document, the editor asks whether you want to save it. It then closes the tab.

case.title: Save
case.description: [save]. Saves the contents of the current tab. If you have not saved the current document, the editor displays the Save As... dialog to define the name, format, and location of the file.

case.title: Save As
case.description: [saveas]. Displays the Save As... dialog to define the name, format, and location of the file.

case.title: Revert to Saved
case.description: Discards any changes made during since the last save.

case.title: Execute Page
case.description: [execute]. Publishes and previews the page without images in the LivePreview directory. This preview is after Application Server processing. This function is enabled only when the Application Server is running. Refer to Starting and Stopping the Application Server.

case.title: Preview in Browser
case.description: [preview]. Opens the page with your default browser. This is without Application Server processing.

case.title: Debug Page
case.description: [debug]. Opens the page in the Xbasic Script Debugger.

case.title: Page Properties
case.description: [page]. Displays the Page Properties dialog, which allows you to set the page's title, margins, background image, background color, text color, and link colors.

section.title: Saving a New HTML or A5W Page
section.description: To save a new page in a web project:

step.description: Click File > Save As to display the Save As dialog box.
Select the project from the drop-down list box at top or click New Project to create a new project.
Optionally, click [newfold] to create a new folder.
Optionally, click [foot] to display only recently modified files.
Optionally, make a selection from the Files of type list box to the list of files in the current folder. The options are:
Select an existing file or enter a File name and click Save.

section.description: To save a new page outside a web project.

step.description: Click File > Save As to display the Save As dialog box.
Select "More files" in the drop-down list box at top.
Optionally, make a selection from the Save as type list box to the list of files in the current folder. The options are:
Optionally, click [create] to create a new folder.
Optionally, click [up] to navigate to a parent folder.

section.title: Setting Page Properties
section.description: To set the page properties of your HTML page through menus:

step.description: Display the WYSIWYG tab of your HTML Editor window.
Select File > Page Properties to display the General tab of the Page Properties dialog.
Optionally, enter the name of your page in the Title field.
Optionally, check Top Margin and enter the number of pixels.
Optionally, check Left Margin and enter the number of pixels.

section.title: Debugging an .A5W Page
section.description: To debug the Xbasic code in a .A5W page:

step.description: Click [debug] to open the Debugger.
Click [sign] to start running the Xbasic code.
Refer to Debugger Settings and Debugger Menu Commands for more information.
